name: hydrostatic
description: class describing a the hydrostatic force of a body

properties.name: method
properties.description: Calculation method for the hydrostatic force. Possible options: {'restoringMatrix','hullIntegration'}

properties.name: restoringMatrix
properties.description: Restoring matrix of the body. Used if model='restoringMatrix'.

properties.name: referencePosition
properties.description: Position of reference for which the hydrostatic force is zero. Used if model='restoringMatrix'.

properties.name: hullSystem
properties.description: Hulls of the body. Used if model='hullIntegration'

properties.name: globalStiffness
properties.description: Global stiffness in X-dirrection, Y-direction and rotation about globall Z axis.
